parameters.name: Force
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to forcibly bind a domain name to the instance. Valid values:

*   **false****: no**
*   **true**: **yes**

Default value: **false**.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description:
The ID of the Alibaba Cloud Domain Name System (DNS) instance.

You can call the [ListCloudGtmInstances ](https://www.alibabacloud.com/help/zh/dns/api-alidns-2015-01-09-listcloudgtminstances?spm=a2c63.p38356.help-menu-search-29697.d\_0)operation to obtain the ID.

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
The language of the content within the request and response. Valid values:

*   **zh**: Chinese
*   **en**: English

Default value: **zh**.

parameters.name: NewDomain
parameters.description: The domain name that you want to bind to the instance. If you leave this parameter empty, the domain name that is bound to the instance is unbound from the instance.

parameters.name: UserClientIp
parameters.description: The IP address of the client.
